html: I knew I had big shoes to fill when I took over a gavel on the House Armed Services Committee from Ellen Tauscher. She was a great a mentor and a remarkable leader, and she made a lasting impact on everyone she met. I extend my sincere condolences to her loved ones.

html: Offut Air Force Base, NE, is the headquarters of USSTRATCOM. @DeptofDefense did consider Offut in their reports. However, it was not considered at risk of recurrent flooding. It was not considered a top ten risk. It is currently underwater.pic.twitter.com/jxP719UOJR
text:
Offut Air Force Base, NE, is the headquarters of USSTRATCOM.
@DeptofDefense did consider Offut in their reports.
However, it was not considered at risk of recurrent flooding. 
It was not considered a top ten risk.
It is currently underwater.pic.twitter.com/jxP719UOJR

html: Tyndall Air Force Base, FL, hosted the 325th Fighter Wing and 55 F-22 Raptors. After Hurricane Michael, 95% of its buildings were damaged or destroyed. @DeptofDefense didn’t consider it, either.pic.twitter.com/ptlgUsYk0r

Camp Lejeune, NC, is home to more than 47,000 brave Marines and Sailors. It is a vital training ground for amphibious assaults. It suffered $3.4+ billion in damages after Hurricane Florence. @DeptofDefense didn’t even consider it in the reports.pic.twitter.com/RIKLBNsmyB
text:
Camp Lejeune, NC, is home to more than 47,000 brave Marines and Sailors.

text:
1 year ago on 2/14/18, 17 were killed in a senseless act of gun violence at Stoneman Douglas HS in Parkland.
